real can u explain how can i increase seed... and explain seed and peer......

Well, I never done anything to increase my speed. But i am using Bitcomet, Which has long term seeding. It is a cool feature that lets u download from bitcomet download managers very fast. Also my companies Internet bandwidth is pretty awesome. 

Seed is a computer that has a complete copy of the specific torrent you are downloading.
And a peer is another computer on the Internet that is sharing the file you wish to download.

this is why people should get a Seedbox/torrentflux or set the sharing ratio higher than 1. 

torrent is all about sharing back your bandwith, if people do not intend to share back to at least the ratio of 1, they should have not downloaded it in the first place.

that being said, what a great release, and to the person who have shared 470gb, you are just brilliant, tpb would be a better place with more people that would share back
